Producer: Frédérique Dumas-Zajdela, Grégoire Melin, Dimitri Rassam, Aton Soumache, Alexis Vonarb
Synopsis: When the evil ruler of the underworld steals the sun from Sohone, a small lunar faun and a girl made of wax help Sohone retrieve it and restore order in the universe.
Title: Mune: Guardian of the Moon
